Class StaffBeanDAO

extends java.lang.Object

                   throws DBException
        Put new worker into DB.
        Parameters:
        id - Id of the new worker
        name - Name of the new worker
        surname - Surname of the new worker
        positionId - New worker's position id
        birthdate - New worker's date of birth
        crewId - Id of the crew, new worker belong to(can be empty - default value = 0)

        DBException
